DOC.brief_summary: This is a demonstration of safety and efficacy of the ablation for pulmonary vein isolation in the treatment of paroxysmal atrial fibrillation.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study of the CardioFocus Endoscopic Ablation System - Adaptive Contact (EAS-AC) for the Treatment of Symptomatic Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: 18 to 70 years paroxysmal atrial fibrillation failure of at least one AAD others overall good health as established by multiple criteria
